TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 控制項的名稱檢視模式。

span.span: Names viewing modes for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖會提供檢視模式 頁面的範例。The following figure provides an example of Page viewing mode. 頁面模式一次顯示一頁內容。Page mode displays a single page of content at a time. 請注意，此模式中包含頁面導覽控制項的顯示的目前頁面計數和位置，並提供**下一步**和**上一步**頁面上的按鈕。Note that this mode includes page navigation controls that display the current page count and position and provide **Next** and **Previous** page buttons. 此檢視模式不會顯示捲軸。This viewing mode does not display scroll bars. ![檢視模式的 FlowDocReader](~/add/media/flowdocrdrviewmode-page.png "模式的 FlowDocReader")![FlowDocReader ViewMode of Page](~/add/media/flowdocrdrviewmode-page.png "FlowDocReader ViewMode of Page") 下圖提供 TwoPage 檢視模式的範例。The following figure provides an example of TwoPage viewing mode. TwoPage 模式這類似於頁面模式，除了兩個向頁面會顯示一次，類似於開啟的活頁簿。TwoPage mode is similar to Page mode, except two facing pages are displayed at a time, similar to an open book. 請注意，此模式中包含頁面導覽控制項的顯示的目前頁面計數和位置，並提供**下一步**和**上一步**頁面上的按鈕; 在此模式中，**下一步**和**上一步** 按鈕會導致兩個頁面跳一次，類似於在活頁簿中開啟頁面的內容。Note that this mode includes page navigation controls that display the current page count and position and provide **Next** and **Previous** page buttons; in this mode, the **Next** and **Previous** page buttons cause content to jump by two pages at a time, similar to turning a page in a book. 目前的頁面數字表示前置的頁面。The current page number indicates the leading page. 此檢視模式不會顯示捲軸。This viewing mode does not display scroll bars. ![FlowDocumentReader 書本檢視模式的](~/add/media/flowdocrdrviewmode-book.png "FlowDocumentReader 書本檢視模式的")![FlowDocumentReader ViewMode of Book](~/add/media/flowdocrdrviewmode-book.png "FlowDocumentReader ViewMode of Book") 下圖提供範例的捲軸檢視模式。The following figure provides an example of Scroll viewing mode. 此檢視模式中不包含頁面導覽控制項。相反地，使用者瀏覽內容使用提供捲軸。This viewing mode does not include page navigation controls; rather, the user navigates content using provided scroll bars. 基於頁面計數和導覽，捲軸檢視模式會顯示在單一頁面的數目一律為 1。For the purposes of page count and navigation, Scroll viewing mode presents a single page whose number is always 1. ![螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocumentReader 的檢視模式的捲動](~/add/media/flowdocrdrviewmode-scroll.png "螢幕擷取畫面： FlowDocumentReader 的檢視模式的捲動")![Screenshot: FlowDocumentReader ViewMode of Scroll](~/add/media/flowdocrdrviewmode-scroll.png "Screenshot: FlowDocumentReader ViewMode of Scroll")

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode Page = int32(0)

summary.span: 表示 應一次顯示一個頁面的內容。

span.span: Indicates that the should show content one page at a time.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode Scroll = int32(2)

summary.span: 表示 應以連續捲動模式來顯示內容。

span.span: Indicates that the should show content in continuous scrolling mode.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReaderViewingMode TwoPage = int32(1)

summary.span: 表示 應一次顯示兩個頁面的內容，類似打開的書。

span.span: Indicates that the should show content two pages at a time, similar to an open book.
